resources.string:
Athelite is a fully customizable workout logger designed for any athlete. 

Simply create a template in the "Templates" section by tapping the plus button. Templates can be added directly to the main page, or through the calendar. 

From there, you can customize your template by adding custom or built in exercises. To create an exercise, simply change the name and the new exercise will be automatically saved. 

Finally, you can customize your exercises by adding the appropriate number of sets, reps, and weight.
Set what happens when timer finishes
Consider buying me a cup of coffee :)
Athelite will use this information for certain calculations. Don\'t worry, we won\'t use this information for anything else.
Select the units you wish to use.
This information will only be used in this application. You can always change or update your profile in the settings.
Athelite is a simple workout tracking android application. No ads, no added complexity, just a simple workout logger anyone can use.
